mkkywxir.content: After lighting the bonfire, run past the @asylum-demon boss

steps.ha1y2mxe: Optionally, kill him right now to get the @demons-great-hammer

steps.mfqlfk9j: Talk to @oscar-of-astora to get the @estus-flask and @undead-asylum-f2-east-key
steps.xvrkd9od: Unlock the gate leading to bonfire
steps.mwv62kxl: If you have chosen a magic class then grab your catalyst or @pyromancy-flame
steps.dlibvkkx: Kill the @asylum-demon boss if you haven't already, remembering to do a two-handed drop attack at the start
steps.lilqh7mx: Continue on to the nest at the edge of the cliff, grabbing the @soul-of-a-lost-undead behind a wall on the left on the way up

mboebl1r.content: Answer Yes to his question and join the @way-of-white covenant to unlock his wares and gesture

i40owf9i.content: Pick up the items around the shrine

steps.zx56zozg: @soul-of-a-lost-undead - after going through the shrine building, instead of turning right to the cementery, go left. The item will be hidden in the furthest nook.
steps.m6n8vmq8: @humanity[Humanity x3] from a corpse hanging on the well next to the bonfire
steps.3i2bvoj6: @firebomb[Firebomb x6] - walk out one of the windows next to @petrus-of-thorolund and go to the dead end
steps.blg9rlf1: @soul-of-a-lost-undead at the top of the stairs next to @undead-parish elevator

1wozwfb8.content: From the chests in a secret area accessible by dropping down the elevator shaft:

ee642x4i.content: Run around the graveyard and pick up the items

steps.pqhiojcp: @large-soul-of-a-lost-undead on a cliff next to the stairs leading to Firelink Shrine
steps.so689vzv: @large-soul-of-a-lost-undead in the middle of the path
steps.r1mlnhdw: @caduceus-round-shield on the level below the previous corpse
steps.t9ghjd9w: @binoculars at the far end of the cliff

steps.mucpwias: Level up with all your soft souls and then head down to @new-londo-ruins

9yquex9g.content: Pick up the items scattered around the safe area

steps.9a0kd3pl: @estoc behind a wall to the right on the way to the bridge
steps.10p8oh4l: @transient-curse[Transient Curse x2] in a vase at the beginning of the bridge

steps.b5z75qiq: Suicide run into the ruins to get the @fire-keeper-soul

s81q0i3j.content: Head to the @valley-of-drakes and suicide run to the @undead-dragon and grab the items

steps.ktlrcdx6: If you died return to the dragon and then go down the valley and take the elevator up to the @darkroot-basin bonfire
steps.k27pc6bn: Kill the @the-black-knight[Black Knight] to get the @blue-titanite-chunk and the @grass-crest-shield
steps.9ev8qg40: Go up the basin and pick up the @hunter-set, @longbow and arrows, and quickly kill the @crystal-lizard
steps.gjnunfg2: Keep going up to @undead-parish, light the bonfire above @blacksmith-andrei[Andre the Blacksmith], and use the elevator shortcut back to the shrine
steps.wea5qrj7: Pick up the @undead-asylum-f2-west-key from the roof and take a quick return flight back to @northern-undead-asylum[Undead Asylum] to get the @rusted-iron-ring

m7g5hqh2.content: Proceed towards the aqueduct, picking up the items along the way

steps.zvk3zdte: @large-soul-of-a-lost-undead on a cliff below the stairs
steps.a1x9zue0: @large-soul-of-a-lost-undead guarded by a rat inside the aqueduct

steps.q7193y4g: Remember about the Dragon and the archer!
steps.pd38ptpa: Optionally kill the @undead-merchant to get the @uchigatana, @residence-key, @orange-guidance-soapstone and @humanity

ef6rayh5.content: Or keep him alive and buy the useful stuff from him

steps.wmutnnoy: @lloyds-talisman[Lloyd's Talismans] for Mimics later on @ 500 souls each

steps.e66aui1g: Pick up the souls, @throwing-knife[Throwing Knives], @light-crossbow and bolts, @rubbish, @humanity from around the first part of the burg
steps.6bedk47k: Open the door below the first archer to get the @wooden-shield
steps.rua4504o: Remember about the second archer in the tower!
steps.vnxmjlnj: Kill the @the-black-knight[Black Knight] and get the @titanite-chunk and @blue-tearstone-ring
steps.wgo2jj3b: Quickly kill the @crystal-lizard under the barrels while going up the tower to get the @twinkling-titanite
steps.1pv04coq: Go through the fog gate and go up the ladder to take out the two archers
steps.jz4h08qk: Kill the @taurus-demon boss, remembering to do a two-handed drop attack at the start
steps.nykzunez: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 5-10 to get summoned
steps.kiiylbfl: Pick up the soul behind the crate in the tower

i3v37cax.content: Talk to @solaire-of-astora[Solaire], answering Yes to his questions to get the @white-sign-soapstone. Praise the Sun!

steps.uvu3zxpf: If you won't need to summon him later you can kill him to get his @sunlight-straight-sword, @iron-and-sun-set, @sunlight-shield and @sunlight-talisman

steps.0dpu9ero: Try not to get burned alive by the @the-bridge-wyvern[Hellkite Wyvern] as you cross to the middle of the bridge and head down the stairs
steps.k6qv40ei: Kick the ladder to open the shortcut back to the bonfire
steps.utweoxu0: Go below the bridge and use your bow to attack the wyvern's tail to get the @drake-sword
steps.jer01k2h: Go back up on the bridge and make a run for the far side when the wyvern lands
steps.iu8hwulq: Light the @warrior-of-sunlight bonfire, optionally join the covenant if you have enough faith, and then open the @undead-parish gate
steps.egs3g3ks: Pick up the souls and the @claymore on the bridge

steps.tyl4w0wa: Kill the @the-black-knight[Black Knight] up in the tower to get the @titanite-chunk
steps.hgaie1up: Get the @mystery-key that you will soon need to free @knight-lautrec and grab the soul from the beam
steps.l5y7jq3n: Get the @basement-key to unlock the Hellkite Bridge door, pull the lever to open the gate and get the @halberd
steps.tsz7qa01: Rest at the bonfire above @blacksmith-andrei[Andre the Blacksmith]

773oqfzl.content: Learn the Hurrah gesture from Andre and buy useful stuff from him

steps.taoqb4td: Talk to @siegmeyer-of-catarina outside the gate to @sens-fortress
steps.to6iml0r: Kill the @the-berenike-knights[Berenike Knight] and get the @fire-keeper-soul[Firekeeper Soul]
steps.6goovgrb: Optionally make a return trip to @firelink-shrine and talk to @anastacia-of-astora to reinforce your @estus-flask
steps.sy9l4lkh: Kill the @the-channeler[Channeler] and all the zombies
steps.7mcbis2o: Pick up the soul, @humanity and free @knight-lautrec[Lautrec] from his cell

steps.0ti3ui7v: You can summon @solaire-of-astora[Solaire] just outside the fog gate
steps.gmsj0k0n: You can also summon @knight-lautrec[Lautrec] from the ledge after the first ladder to the fog gate if you rescued him and went to talk to him at @firelink-shrine
steps.tn7n4iii: Cut off the tail of the first gargoyle to get the @gargoyle-tail-axe

qgz88vm3.content: Talk to @oswald-of-carim, learn the Well! What Is It! gesture and buy useful stuff from him

steps.0nes3bqw: @purging-stone[Purging Stones] @ 3,000 souls each for @depths[The Depths] later on

steps.bwpygzb6: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 15-25 to get summoned
steps.kw873dnv: Head back to the Hellkite Bridge and unlock the basement door and head down to the @lower-undead-burg

steps.m6ko9p7l: Use the @residence-key to free @griggs-of-vinheim from the house and pick up the @sorcerer-set and @sorcerers-catalyst
steps.l2prk06t: Pick up the @twin-humanities, @mail-breaker, @thief-set, @target-shield and soul from around the burg
steps.3enl8dli: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 20-30 to get summoned

rheuowdb.content: Head down the stairs and up the left tower to the @undead-merchant-female[Female Undead Merchant] and buy useful stuff from her

steps.m0ljpw64: @purple-moss-clump[Purple Moss Clumps] @ 500 souls each for @blighttown later on
steps.ywvax6l5: @blooming-purple-moss-clump[Blooming Purple Moss Clumps] @ 1,000 souls each for @blighttown later on
steps.0cv9uzjs: @transient-curse[Transient Curses] @ 4,000 souls each for @new-londo-ruins later on

steps.2su6rlxx: Head down to the shrine and talk to @griggs-of-vinheim, answering Yes to his question and buy any sorceries you need from him
steps.9ung2qjv: Optionally kill @knight-lautrec[Lautrec] if you want to keep the @anastacia-of-astora[shrine Firekeeper] alive and don't need @favor-set[his armor] but want the @ring-of-favor-and-protection
steps.hxctbq1f: Head back up to the aqueduct, go down the tower and across to the other tower that leads to @depths[The Depths]

steps.trdudvav: Kill the first @butcher and get the @large-ember from the chest
steps.v4t5wigb: Free @laurentius-of-the-great-swamp by rolling in to the barrels and talk to him
steps.u7km8ia2: Remember about the slime above the first soul!
steps.u2v76n89: Head back up to the butcher area, drop down the hole behind his table, get the @spider-shield, kill the @giant-rat, get the @sewer-chamber-key and soul
steps.rarvu4hc: On the upper level kill the @the-channeler[Channeler], and pick up the @large-titanite-shard and @greataxe
steps.wdafkxwm: Either slide, drop or walk down to the lower level and beward the @basilisk[Basilisks]!
steps.41kjl6of: On the lower level get the @ring-of-the-evil-eye and @humanity
steps.psmg57ch: Open up the shortcut back to the bonfire and if you're not already in human form go to the bonfire and reverse hollowing
steps.9l581oi1: Go back down and get @knight-kirk to invade and then kill him
steps.g5xt65e7: Head down to the boss fog gate, picking up the @heavy-crossbow and bolts on the way

steps.fjdfdzxu: You can summon @solaire-of-astora[Solaire] just above the fog gate
steps.wmgbragy: You can also summon @knight-lautrec[Lautrec] using the summon sign on the other side of the pillar from Solaire
steps.b3g81yvp: Cut off the tail of the dragon to get the @dragon-kings-great-axe[Dragon King Great Axe]
steps.sscqj4jt: Pick up the @warrior-set when you've killed it

steps.xkloihjf: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 25-35 to get summoned
steps.y8sdzffr: Talk to @domhnall-of-zena, learn the Joy gesture and buy any armor, arrows etc. that you need
steps.xxxuxhl2: Make sure you have some @purple-moss-clump[Purple Moss Clumps] and @blooming-purple-moss-clump[Blooming Purple Moss Clumps], if not run back to the @undead-merchant-female[Female Undead Merchant] and buy some
steps.dwwcat4e: Open the door to @blighttown and head down the ladder

steps.z6krmghl: Take it slowly. Be wary of @blowdart-sniper[Blowdart Snipers]!
steps.j61lmg4i: Make a running jump to get the @iaito, aim for the post
steps.9tlvugfe: Go down below where the Iaito was to get the @blooming-purple-moss-clump[Blooming Purple Moss Clumps] and walk over the swaying bridge to get the @humanity and then go back up to the bonfire
steps.don35xer: Continue on passed the bonfire and remember about the collapsing floor trap beside the soul!
steps.2o2rvx4f: Move on to the next section remembering about the @blowdart-sniper perched on a high ledge
steps.j3s34w0c: Go down the longest ladder in this section and get rid of the @blowdart-sniper and grab the @eagle-shield
steps.1xh72amw: Go back up to snipe the @parasitic-wall-hugger with your bow and go down to get the @power-within pyromancy spell
steps.nr07j6a9: Head through the gap in the wall and down the ladder to the fog gate
steps.do2goxtp: Double back and fall down to grab the @whip
steps.titbfkw3: Fall down again and continue down the walkways towards the second bonfire, remembering about the @blowdart-sniper along the way
steps.vh821se2: Get the @wanderer-set and the @falchion from beside the sniper
steps.bfdd775n: Put on the @rusted-iron-ring before you get to the bottom and make a run for the bonfire
steps.3s0p4uye: Light the second bonfire and get the @dragon-scale from the chest in the bonfire tunnel
steps.e2otrlrd: Run around the swamp to get the @pyromancer-set, @poison-mist pyromancy spell, the @large-titanite-shard[Large Titanite Shards], @server and souls
steps.56mb8ihu: Take a quick detour up the branch towards @the-great-hollow to get the @plank-shield on the corpse and the @twin-humanities behind the illusory wall
steps.kafitpsw: Kill the boulder throwing @infested-barbarian[Infested Barbarians] to get the @great-club
steps.mgiwug9a: Optionally farm the @giant-leech[Giant Leeches] for @large-titanite-shard[Large Titanite Shards] and @green-titanite-shard[Green Titanite Shards]
steps.t3x9duk0: Go up on the wheel, go up two ladders and then run around the ledge to kill the @blowdart-sniper[Blowdart Snipers]
steps.yaiav4ou: Slide down the ladder, kill the @flaming-attack-dog[Dogs] and pick up the @fire-keeper-soul
steps.kgf4ppuy: Return to the bonfire and if you're not human then reverse hollowing and kill @maneater-mildred when she invades to get the @butcher-knife and some @humanity

steps.j2hlc4ty: You can summon @maneater-mildred from beside the fog gate if you killed her

zpea4cr2.content: Go down and hit the illusory wall and talk to @eingyi, answering Yes to his question so he moves to the side. Reload your game if you answered No and try again

steps.1xlobfve: If you want to buy the @poison-mist or @toxic-mist pyromancy spells then you need to get infested with an @egg-head first
steps.i9zln8x4: If your intelligence is 11 or above he will give you a @pyromancy-flame

0m5vsfm0.content: Talk to @the-ancient-spider-queen and optionally join the @chaos-servant covenant

steps.1yuosfx1: If you joined the convenant then feed her 30 @humanity to open up the shortcut to @lost-izalith

steps.xiyvbujg: Light this bonfire and then return to the previous bonfire
steps.r7uyoilm: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 25-40 to get summoned
steps.7lt9opvu: Talk to @quelana-of-izalith if she is there to upgrade your @pyromancy-flame or buy some Pyromancy spells
steps.cniea5oa: Go up on the wheel again and at the top of first ladder cross @[That Fucking Branch] to get the @crimson-set, @tin-banishment-catalyst and @remedy sorcery
steps.sc1jqb0f: Keep going up to the top and get the @key-to-new-londo-ruins
steps.dzduuxlt: Go out to the @valley-of-drakes and kill the @undead-dragon with your bow or spells
steps.xetxlffw: If you didn't kill @knight-lautrec[Lautrec] earlier pick up the @dingy-set and @black-eye-orb from where @anastacia-of-astora was sitting

fewvo3qh.content: Talk to the various people now at the shrine

steps.vn6yla9o: @griggs-of-vinheim to learn sorceries if your intelligence is 10 or over
steps.bz0mfl2m: @laurentius-of-the-great-swamp to get a @pyromancy-flame if you need one and to upgrade it
steps.9uwlrc47: @petrus-of-thorolund to buy any miracles you need
steps.13q3jo6x: @kingseeker-frampt if you want to trade some titanite or items

steps.23n6qvns: Head to the @undead-parish and rest at the bonfire above Andre
steps.t8f3997b: Give the @large-ember to @blacksmith-andrei[Andre the Blacksmith] and upgrade your weapons
steps.x9gnqit0: Head in to @darkroot-garden, rest at the bonfire behind the illusory wall and open the door using the @crest-of-artorias but do not go through it
steps.p8jljcxf: Head up to the tower and kill @havel-the-rock to get @havels-ring
steps.hu89iem3: Make sure you are wearing the @rusted-iron-ring
steps.02iroacl: Kill the @crystal-golem[Crystal Golems] and then the @hydra to get the @dragon-scale and @dusk-crown-ring
steps.sn56z1lv: Kill the @golden-crystal-golem, reloading your game if it's not there
steps.lbg6jtr6: Talk to @dusk-of-oolacile, answering Yes to her question
steps.qo747o2p: Go back to where the Hydra fight happened and summon @dusk-of-oolacile, learn her Proper Bow gesture and buy any sorceries you need or the catalyst
steps.6764kqm7: Go back to where you killed the @golden-crystal-golem and pick up the @antiquated-set
steps.fsq4iqd8: Climb up the ladder beside the waterfall and then climb the second ladder to the bridge
steps.qxfn3fc5: Head across the bridge in to @darkroot-garden

steps.vqa15rl4: Draw out the @mushroom-people and get the @enchanted-ember from the chest
steps.yi10cxya: Head deeper in to the forest to the broken tower beside the bridge and get the @stone-knight-set from the chest behind the tower
steps.k8nkjow0: Go across the bridge and talk to @alvina-of-the-darkroot-wood and optionally join the @forest-hunter covenant to get the @cat-covenant-ring
steps.4b6o19wu: If you joined the covenant talk to @shiva-of-the-east so that you can buy stuff from him later

gycmhi4g.content: If you didn't join the covenant

steps.lkzuom2k: Clear out the rest of the enemies in this section of the forest

steps.3j74u6dz: Go to the lower section of the forest and kill all the @ents and pick up the @eastern-set
steps.wg1zo5u8: Return to the bonfire through the door you opened earlier with the @crest-of-artorias
steps.5o99zbls: Go through the gap in the wall to the right of the door and head down, remembering that when you pick up the soul on the right it will spawn three @ents
steps.iwhc6jn1: After the fog gate hit the tree on the right to open up a passage to a secret area
steps.sb8foioo: Kill the @great-stone-knight in the main area first, then the one in the tower and pick up the @wolf-ring
steps.h98huc5k: Head back out of the secret area and kill the other @great-stone-knight[Great Stone Knights] and @ents that spawn
steps.8ov8za2m: Pick up the @partizan from the alcove on the left wall

steps.3ahm7pux: You can summon @witch-beatrice at the bottom of the tower leading to the boss
steps.9u1zdd7g: After the fight head up the tower to get the @watchtower-basement-key, @divine-ember and @homeward-bone

steps.hwou4tny: Go back through the forest and kill @great-grey-wolf-sif to get the @covenant-of-artorias and remember to pick up the @hornet-ring
steps.t33yd1y4: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 15-25 for the Butterfly and 20-50 for Sif, though summons for both are rare
steps.qoh2c9sj: Return to @blacksmith-andrei[Andre] and give him the @divine-ember and upgrade your weapon if needed
steps.5vsqznlh: @reah-of-thorolund[Reah] and her companions should be gone. If @petrus-of-thorolund[Petrus] is there talk to him and then kill him now if you don't want him to kill Reah later. If he's not then come back later
steps.sji904u3: Make a quick run down to @new-londo-ruins, give the @enchanted-ember to @blacksmith-rickert-of-vinheim and upgrade your weapons if needed

97j493k8.content: If you're a member of the @forest-hunter covenant and talked to @shiva-of-the-east[Shiva] earlier then optionally do a quick run to @blighttown to talk to him

steps.dfdl1wra: Buy weapons or the @east-wood-grain-ring from him
steps.2j3riied: If you've bought all you need then you can now kill him and his bodyguard to get their gear but you will be kicked out of the covenant
steps.c9j31ssx: If you fail to kill him then they will return to the forest where you first met them and you can kill them there

steps.sknukap5: Head back to the @undead-parish and rest at the bonfire above Andre

steps.ireixkqu: Cross the first swinging blade walkway, remembering about the @serpent-mage trying to knock you off
steps.wpl3nwa9: Take out the @serpent-mage with your bow before crossing the second walkway and remember about the arrow trap at the end
steps.85984u2c: Get the @large-titanite-shard[Large Titanite Shards] from the chest
steps.unaslbw7: Cross the next walkway and remember about the boulder and the @man-serpent[Serpent Soldier] at the end
steps.n9vsybkh: Run halfway to the fog gate, wait for a boulder and then run to the top and get the @ring-of-steel-protection from the chest
steps.4374zvsf: Go back to the fog gate and remember about the reverse arrow trap in the next room
steps.hhsfcwpx: Wait for a boulder and then run up and jump off to the left just before the broken pillar on to a wooden platform
steps.2oqobsl7: Run up to the boulder switch, turn it so that it breaks the wall, then turn it so that it starts filling the hole
steps.u2dbx7m8: Pick up the @shotel and talk to @siegmeyer-of-catarina
steps.u83vnb76: Return to the boulder switch and point it outside
steps.umclfdez: Run down to the hole the boulder fills, get the @covetous-gold-serpent-ring and use a @lloyds-talisman on the mimic chest to get the @lightning-spear
steps.6vvksna0: Use the elevator to get back to the boulder switch room and continue through the corridor, remembering about the multi arrow trap
steps.0zooxfcl: Cross the next swinging blade walkway, kill the @man-serpent[Serpent Soldiers] and get the @large-titanite-shard[Large Titanite Shards]
steps.tz3dyzts: Cross the last swinging blade walkway, remembering about the @serpent-mage at the start and the arrow traps at the end
steps.4hql5b31: Go through the fog gate and wait for a gap in the fire and light the first bonfire

9bbfjnr0.content: Jump across the gap in the walkway and buy useful stuff from the @crestfallen-merchant

steps.u962d7jh: Go down the stairs below the merchant and get the @cage-key
steps.ig1a5gqe: Get the @large-titanite-shard[Large Titanite Shards], @sniper-crossbow,  bolts and @flame-stoneplate-ring from around the fortress
steps.j18w5omf: Kill @ricard-the-archer to get his @ricards-rapier[Rapier] and get the @divine-blessing and @rare-ring-of-sacrifice in the tower above him
steps.hel6yzos: Open the cage shortcut using the @cage-key and quickly run in and out of the cage to send it down

o8mxf4p3.content: Kill the @iron-golem to open up the portal to @anor-londo

steps.e7r8iy6t: You can summon @iron-knight-tarkus in the tower across from the fog gate

steps.u75sp44g: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 40-50 to get summoned
steps.w1u8vmtt: Put on the @rusted-iron-ring, go down in the cage elevator and drop down on to the ledge with the serpents and kill them
steps.1i58ys5v: Kill the two @titanite-demon[Titanite Demons] in the first area to get @demon-titanite[Demon Titanites] and the @scythe
steps.4oi7cz9n: Kill the other two @titanite-demon[Titanite Demons] to get more @demon-titanite[Demon Titanites]
steps.zsm036dk: Climb the ladder out of the pit, hit the illusory wall, climb the second ladder and kill the giant that opened the gate to get a @titanite-chunk
steps.cllre78b: Return to the wooden platform you jump on to during the boulder run and drop down the other side to get the @slumbering-dragoncrest-ring
steps.o3568qeb: Return to the bonfire and go up and use the portal to @anor-londo

steps.bkxav7e7: Run passed the @sentinel[Sentinels], light the bonfire, talk to @darkmoon-knightess and reinforce your @estus-flask if you need to
steps.1hjda2z5: Kill the two @sentinel[Sentinels] you ran passed and open the chest to get a @demon-titanite
steps.fv6ngoq7: Cross the courtyard and kill the other two, using a @lloyds-talisman on the right mimic chest to get the @halberd[Crystal Halberd] and opening the left chest to get a @twinkling-titanite
steps.qhsi3doi: Go down the elevator and kill the @gargoyle-lightning[Lightning Gargoyle]
steps.okysjcyf: Get the @demon-titanite from the chest below and walk up the beams in to the chapel
steps.hnz6x4av: Walk along the rafters and remember to hit the chain of the chandelier
steps.da1mu05x: Jump down onto the platform with the statues and roll through the pillars on the other side of the room. Kill the @painting-guardian and open the chest to get the @divine-blessing.
steps.30uoo5ey: Turn the bridge lever once in an anti-clockwise direction to lower the platform and kill the second @gargoyle-lightning[Lightning Gargoyle]
steps.2by0dhwd: Go up the giant staircase and kill the @sentinel[Sentinels] and @bat-wing-demon[Bat Wing Demons]
steps.70g2yujv: Go up the buttress and kill the right @silver-knight[Silver Knight Archer], remembering not to use your shield but dodge towards him instead until he starts meleeing
steps.g6e2mbxx: If you have the balls go and kill the second archer to get the @soul-of-a-hero
steps.obysrk0l: Drop down on to the platform after the first archer and enter the left door to light the bonfire. Congratulate yourself!
steps.oxp3uc9j: Cross the hallway and get the @sunlight-medal[Sunlight Medals] from the chest
steps.q8ir0mm0: Go down the corridor and through the left door and hit the illusory wall
steps.oblcsdvw: Go down in to the basement and open the four chests that sit together to get @havels-set, @havels-greatshield and the @dragon-tooth
steps.a4twpxp5: Use a @lloyds-talisman on the single mimic chest to get the @club[Occult Club]
steps.oinyv3dl: Go up the stairs and use @lloyds-talisman[Lloyd's Talismans] on the two mimic chests to get the @silver-coin[Silver Coins] and the @gold-coin
steps.boctbiv6: Use ranged attacks to kill the @titanite-demon from above
steps.znhf9pnl: Kill the @silver-knight[Silver Knight Archer] at the end of the corridor
steps.c23ztm42: Coming from the dead archer go through the right door and up to the roof, remembering about the @silver-knight behind the door
steps.tmdr9yeu: Kill the archer on the right but then head down the stairs on the left to talk to @siegmeyer-of-catarina[Siegmeyer]
steps.79adabv1: Bait each of the four @silver-knight[Silver Knights] one at a time from the room up on to the roof to kill them
steps.jw7bqk69: Talk to @siegmeyer-of-catarina[Siegmeyer] again to get the @tiny-beings-ring
steps.5bv2an2z: Open the chest in the room to get the two @demon-titanite[Demon Titanites]
steps.ukazfd7b: Unlock the door, go back up the roof and go down the stairs where the archer was
steps.jxh9ojla: Go across the corridor and kill the two @silver-knight[Silver Knights], get the @silver-knight-set from the two chests and unlock the shortcut back to the bonfire
steps.hbq6p2li: Go back upstairs and keep going up to top of the large hall, go around the walkway and down to the @giant-blacksmith
steps.qdw7cltu: Get the @hawk-ring from the chest behind him

c11kxu0z.content: Talk to him and buy useful stuff from him

steps.pkhtatft: Create any lightning weapons you need

steps.64zpds4e: Open the gate leading back to the giant staircase and pick up the @titanite-chunk
steps.vjtwzz1p: Go back upstairs and drop out the broken window to get the @dragonslayer-greatbow
steps.vyto3rgs: Go back to the large hall and open the large main door
steps.ara94yy5: Return to the bonfire if you need to

steps.tsxf30qa: You can summon @solaire-of-astora[Solaire] from the steps near the archer in the large hall
steps.hc5rbavm: The best place to summon other players for this fight is the second bonfire in the room after the archers
steps.9ly8al5p: If you want to get @smoughs-set from @domnhall-of-zena[Domhnhall of Zena] or want to make @smoughs-hammer then kill Ornstein first
steps.ygpvr4k7: If you want to get @ornsteins-set from @domnhall-of-zena[Domhnhall of Zena] or want the @leo-ring or want to make the @dragon-slayer-spear then kill Smough first

steps.itg1wzr9: Go up one the screw elevators and light the bonfire
steps.6xasa04i: Talk to @gwynevere[Princess Gwynevere], get the @lordvessel and optionally join the @princess-guard covenant
steps.whrxk4sm: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 40-50 to get summoned

34u4e8uo.content: If you didn't kill @knight-lautrec[Lautrec] earlier then return to the large hall and use the the @black-eye-orb to invade his world and kill him

steps.186n7okn: You will get the @anastacia-of-astora[Ring of Favor and Protection], @anastacia-of-astora's soul, a @souvenir-of-reprisal and five @humanity
steps.03zree38: When you return to @firelink-shrine you can revive @anastacia-of-astora with her soul or you can choose to use it to reinforce your @estus-flask
steps.zpz34264: After killing him you can get the @favor-set from the balcony above where you fought @ornstein-and-smough

steps.a4ax2dcr: Now that we can fast travel, warp back to @firelink-shrine

nhqhb03q.content: Talk to the various people now at the shrine

steps.os84eys8: Talk to @siegmeyer-of-catarina[Siegmeyer] and answer Yes to his question to get the @emit-force miracle
steps.bcuc3pi2: Do not speak to @kingseeker-frampt[Frampt] if you want to join the @darkwraith covenant later
steps.ikqkefgv: Talk to @domhnall-of-zena under the aqueduct to buy any of the boss armor you need

steps.1dqw90jm: Take a flight back to @northern-undead-asylum[Undead Asylum]

steps.mmr7ik7l: Kill the @the-black-knight[Black Knight] near your starting cell to get a @red-titanite-chunk and pick up the @peculiar-doll
steps.iel09v2s: Kill the @the-black-knight[Black Knight] near where you picked up your first weapon to get another @red-titanite-chunk
steps.be9ctqbm: Kill the now hollow Elite Knight to get the @crest-shield

steps.zgkximea: Run up to the @undead-merchant-female[Female Undead Merchant] in the aqueduct and buy all the @transient-curse[Transient Curses] she has and equip them
steps.gqy23kz5: On your way to the wooden bridges get ready to be attacked by the @crestfallen-warrior
steps.lenzq5tf: Use one of your @transient-curse[Transient Curses] and keep them visible on your HUD so that you know when it expires
steps.umb2lfjy: Make your way through the first part of the ruins picking up the @parrying-dagger and killing the @banshee to get the two @transient-curse[Transient Curses]
steps.tb4lo0fo: Kick the ladder to relase it and go down and kill the two @ghost[Ghosts] to stop them attacking you from below
steps.rold9oui: Approach the house and kill the @ghost[Ghosts] that come out of the water before entering house
steps.0l4m5gqb: Go up the ladder in the fireplace and talk to  @ingward to get the @key-to-the-seal and buy more @transient-curse[Transient Curses] if you need them
steps.ga25mr7z: Go downstairs and get the @cursebite-ring from the ledge
steps.r0goai04: Go out the other door and get @green-titanite-shard, @humanity and jump to the roof to get the @rare-ring-of-sacrifice
steps.hwl63fzv: Head to the tower, open the door with the @key-to-the-seal and push the lever clockwise to drain the water
steps.nzrw1k0m: Go upstairs in the tower and get the @composite-bow and large arrows
steps.v3fo7jb9: Pull the lever and go down the elevator to the @valley-of-drakes entrance
steps.rwwihfis: Kill the @drake[Drakes], get the @brigand-armor-set and @spider-shield, and go up the ladder to get the @red-tearstone-ring
steps.vafj4tia: Continue through the buildings and through the fog gate
steps.khrx9k8g: Clear out the @darkwraith-knight[Darkwraith Knights] and @mass-of-souls so you can get the @humanity and trigger the elevator shortcut to the beginning of the ruins
steps.a33hdl67: Go out the smaller side door and up to open the chest with the @very-large-ember[Very Large Ember]
steps.ulpgtqni: Go back down and out the larger door and pick up the souls and six @cracked-red-eye-orb[Cracked Red Eye Orbs]
steps.q8b0frsb: Hit the illusory wall and open the chest to get a @titanite-chunk
steps.ved02o9h: Clear out the @darkwraith-knight[Darkwraith Knights] and @mass-of-souls and get the @titanite-chunk from the chest

steps.ehytebr4: You can summon @witch-beatrice from behind the pillar if you previously summoned her for the @moonlight-butterfly fight

steps.l2w8iffg: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 60-75 to get summoned
steps.lhsci96q: Warp to @undead-parish and give the @very-large-ember to @blacksmith-andrei[Andre] and upgrade your weapons
steps.t1v7286t: Warp to @firelink-shrine and go down to the @valley-of-drakes to get the @witch-set and @beatrices-catalyst
steps.xj6th88q: Make sure you have at least three @purple-moss-clump[Purple Moss Clumps] and warp to the @daughter-of-chaos bonfire
steps.pzctorb9: Go talk to @siegmeyer-of-catarina[Siegmeyer] in the @blighttown swamp and give him the @purple-moss-clump[Purple Moss Clumps] to get the @pierce-shield
steps.crh7sov4: Go up the branch and hit the illusory wall behind the chest and go in to @the-great-hollow

steps.m0rqwdzm: Note: It's very hard to give good directions for this section due to the maze of branches and random spawning patterns of the Crystal Lizards
steps.6ck8iv9n: Light and rest at the bonfire after you go down the first ladder
steps.jbxs6ncc: Make your way down the branches looking out for @crystal-lizard[Crystal Lizards] and @basilisk[Basilisks]
steps.0w4l18aj: Near the top you can roll down in to the main tree trunk in the center of the area to pick up the @cloranthy-ring
steps.xchqrr4l: Roll and drop to various branches to get the titanites
steps.9zxlgc0r: After you kill the first three @basilisk[Basilisks] there is a soul hidden to the left as you exit the cave they were in
steps.s4yq0c79: Slide down the two ladders to the first canopy and kill the two @basilisk[Basilisks] there
steps.yp09iov7: Slide down the ladder in the center to the next canopy and be ready to kill four more and then pick up the soul
steps.bbkfos51: Continue down the branches and then on to the mushrooms, exiting the fog gate at the bottom to get to @ash-lake

steps.hltgz05y: Light and rest at the bonfire
steps.6n27ktsu: Kill the @black-hydra to get two @dragon-scale[Dragon Scales] and then get one more from the corpse to the left
steps.fi2b14cv: Walk along the sand and get the @dragon-scale from the small dead tree
steps.e0je1ud9: Get the @dragon-scale from the corpse on left by the water after the small dead tree
steps.87jot0j7: Go up the branch on the outside of the first huge tree, drop off to the right on to the hidden platform and head in to the tree to get the @great-magic-barrier miracle
steps.tbd5vywr: Continue along the sand to the next tree, light the bonfire and optionally join the @path-of-the-dragon covenant
steps.t0af049n: Cut off the tail of the dragon to get the @dragon-greatsword
steps.j7c9r16l: Make sure you have some @blooming-purple-moss-clump[Blooming Purple Moss Clumps] in case you get toxic from the @engorged-zombie[Engorged Zombies]

steps.94rz0h9q: Go down the elevator and turn the platform lever anti-clockwise and enter the chapel
steps.76fvyjq2: Examine the painting to warp to the @painted-world-of-ariamis
steps.f2v2zihq: Light and rest at the bonfire
steps.zwg6mjwc: Remember to use range attacks on the @engorged-zombie[Engorged Zombies] so you don't get toxic
steps.8w50g51m: Go up the stairs and on to the roof of the first building and use your bow to pull the two @crow-demon[Crow Demons] from the other tower to you so they don't ambush you later
steps.u4po7o0z: Drop down to get the @dried-finger and then go the bottom floor of the building to get the soul
steps.ozu8vh05: Clear out the next building, remembering about the two @zombie[Zombies] hanging from the ledge, and hit the rope holding the zombie to drop it down
steps.uem70m1y: Go upstairs, jump across the gap and get the soul and the @egg-vermifuge, slide down the ladder and get the @painting-guardian-set
steps.jdxbo0wj: Lure the @crow-demon[Crow Demons] out of the tower one by one
steps.aih522sk: Go to the top of the spiral staircase to get the @red-sign-soapstone and on the way back down drop to the ledge to get the soul
steps.6rsxyxq1: Kill the @undead-dragon and then pick up the soul, @dragon-scale and the @bloodshield from the bridge
steps.6agct4wi: Go back to the tower, through the fog gate and open the shortcut back to the bonfire
steps.c1e41ykx: Go down to the basement and kill the six @wheel-skeleton[Wheel Skeletons], making sure to pull one at a time with your bow
steps.dl7n94c1: Grab the two souls and turn the lever to open the gate that leads to the boss
steps.vbbj4e9w: Hit the illusory wall and explore the tunnels, kill the three @wheel-skeleton[Wheel Skeletons], get the @annex-key and kill the @engorged-zombie to get the @fire-surge pyromancy
steps.x5fotu0g: Leave the tunnels using the well ladder, go up the stairs to get the @ring-of-sacrifice and grab the @humanity from the zombie you dropped earlier
steps.w92axysi: Open the Annex door and head up the stairs
steps.g4unzd2b: Head up on to the roof of the building to the left, kill the two @crow-demon[Crow Demons], watch for an ambush by two more and get the @vow-of-silence miracle
steps.7oqr2mo8: Take the stairs in to the round tower and pick up the @black-set
steps.2sg6s6dt: Go to the lower section and get the @dark-ember
steps.u10acbd6: Break the wooden fence to get @velkas-rapier, drop down in to the building and get the @gold-coin
steps.t2c9tw6t: Return to the bonfire and reverse hollowing
steps.deqfdinj: Go the open area with all the spikes, wait for @king-jeremiah to invade and kill him to get the @notched-whip
steps.v3ifrw0j: Pick up the souls in the area and the @acid-surge pyromancy hidden behind the wall
steps.0b28m296: Go through the gate you opened earlier, walk across the bridge, watching out for the zombies and kill the @the-tower-knight[Tower Knight] to get the @large-titanite-shard
steps.lt8ajoof: Reload your game before you enter the fog gate, go through and pick up the @xanthous-set that should now have appeared

steps.wx3nq8pl: Cut off her tail to get @priscillas-dagger

steps.c3js37hk: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 55-60 to get summoned
steps.et4ukn9h: Jump off the ledge to warp back to @anor-londo
steps.oct43m31: Leave the chapel and turn the platform lever clockwise to return it to its normal position and go to the first @anor-londo bonfire
steps.vqv5n1dm: Warp to @undead-parish and give the @dark-ember to @blacksmith-andrei[Andre] and upgrade your weapons
steps.eb7qe6my: Warp back to @anor-londo and head to @the-dukes-archives

steps.qsj6e5b9: Kill the two @mecha-boar[Mecha Boars] and rest at the bonfire
steps.rh3zpud0: Go up the first elevator and kill the @crystal-golem to get the @broken-pendant (DLC Only)
steps.9r7nml7n: Clear out the crystal skeletons and the @the-channeler[Channeler] and get the soul
steps.prpjptcs: Take the left hand side stairs and get the @twinkling-titanite from the chest
steps.04old6x0: Go around to the other side and get the @twinkling-titanite from the balcony and the crystal @knight-shield from the mimic
steps.pvog7n7u: Take the elevator up to the next level, draw out and kill the crytalline hollow, and quickly kill the @crystal-lizard on the stairs to get two @twinkling-titanite[Twinkling Titanites]
steps.7hqw88me: Put on a @rare-ring-of-sacrifice, go through the fog gate and let @seath-the-scaleless kill you
steps.u5qwq1u8: Rest at the cell bonfire and kill the @man-serpent to get the @archive-tower-cell-key
steps.ek9uf2xd: Let yourself out of the cell, try to kill the two @man-serpent[Man Serpents] that run passed then kill the four @pisaca[Pisacas] that are chasing them
steps.4h7071qc: Head up the stairs and up the ladder, walk along the ledge to the left and drop down to the cell to get the @maiden-set and the @white-seance-ring
steps.t5mhcqt1: Open the third cell, drop down to get the @archive-prison-extra-key and use it to open the second cell and get the soul
steps.sk0hpaky: Kill the rest of the @pisaca[Pisacas] at the bottom, get the @soothing-sunlight and @bountiful-sunlight miracles, and talk to @big-hat-logan
steps.bqbxonoe: Go up the ladder, kill the two @man-serpent[Man Serpents], turn off the alarm and get the @archive-tower-giant-door-key from the chest
steps.un21bvh3: Head back up to your cell and open the other door, drop down to get the soul and then drop down a couple of levels back to the alarm
steps.pocuom5y: Head all the way back up and open the door at the top of the ladder
steps.0hb5cpx3: Head up and kill the @the-channeler[Channeler] up on the ledge and the second one around the corner
steps.7jzqz2xg: Head to the left, spin the staircase around, go down to get the @twinkling-titanite from the chest and then head back up the stairs again
steps.qhxyx207: Make sure you have full health and drop down to the second spinning staircase
steps.c62b7zjy: Go up the stairs and get the @strong-magic-shield sorcery
steps.um6glscf: Spin the stairs, go down and kill the archer on the ledge, slide down the ladder and pull the lever to open the bookcase shortcut
steps.z84150dw: Go in to the larger of the two rooms and get the @symbol-of-avarice and the enchanted @falchion from the mimic in the far right part of the room
steps.16dhzha8: Open the other chests, remembering about the one behind the bookcase, to get the @channeler-set, @archive-tower-giant-cell-key and the @crystal-ember
steps.qe3fww6h: Go to the smaller room and get the @blue-titanite-chunk from the chest
steps.ab6n6q58: Go out through the bookcase shortcut and rest at the bonfire
steps.er8z79bm: Clear out the two rooms of the library, including the archer on the bookcase and the @the-channeler[Channelers]
steps.2gkbvb8n: Spin the staircase and jump off the lower steps while it's rotating to land on the top of the bookshelf and get the @avelyn crossbow from the chest
steps.l80gz6sd: Go back through the bookcase shortcut, pull the lever in the larger room to lower the stairs, get the @prism-stone[Prism Stones] from the chest and go through the fog gate
steps.bw1440zk: Kill the @golden-crystal-golem and talk to @sieglinde-of-catarina, answering Yes to her question
steps.afciikar: Kill the other @crystal-golem[Crystal Golems] and pick up the @crystalline-set and the @blue-titanite-chunk

steps.ctb80yjh: Take the first invisible path and get the @humanity
steps.95ykigsc: Take the next invisible path, kill the @crystal-golem, drop off to the left and double back in to the small tunnel behind you and kill the three @crystal-lizard[Crystal Lizards]
steps.q9aq90ea: Turn around again and take the invisible path down to get the @blue-titanite-slab
steps.7idiub1h: Head back up and kill the @golden-crystal-golem and get the @blue-titanite-chunk
steps.a21kz1tm: Go down the last invisible path and get the soul in front of the @moonlight-butterfly but be careful because it will probably attack you
steps.54jnwzj6: Put on the @covetous-gold-serpent-ring and kill the @man-eater-shell[Man-Eater Shells] to get some @purging-stone[Purging Stones] and @twinkling-titanite

steps.8kam3f8m: You have to break the crystal before you can do damage to him
steps.oabsvbx7: Cut off his tail to get the @moonlight-greatsword

steps.qyuer0nh: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 60-75+ to get summoned

8l6fu35y.content: Return to the bonfire, go through the bookcase shortcut and in to the small room to talk to @big-hat-logan and buy any sorceries you need

steps.8gjjaon4: If you want @big-hats-set then you will need to buy all of his sorceries to get him to leave and go hollow
steps.4o6y0b14: If you only need the @white-dragon-breath sorcery, his @big-hats-set[Big Hat] and @tin-crystallization-catalyst you can kill him now
steps.gljgp4r1: When he has left, go to the room where you first encountered @seath-the-scaleless, kill him and then return to this room to get @big-hats-set from the new chest

steps.w3to1o6z: Go back up the ladder, spin the stairs, go down them and out on to the balcony, and go back in to the prison area
steps.cpuaky8o: Go down to the bottom and use the @archive-tower-giant-cell-key to open the gate and get the @fire-keeper-soul[Firekeeper Soul]
steps.708fqh2e: Return to the archives, go down one floor to the second floor, go to the first archive room and use the lever to call the elevator
steps.yrkzsija: Go to the room where you first encountered @seath-the-scaleless and get the @large-magic-ember from the chest and the soul from the balcony
steps.tib6smc1: Return to the bonfire, warp to @firelink-shrine, talk to @sieglinde-of-catarina[Sieglinde], answering Yes to her question, and go down to reinforce your @estus-flask
steps.pud9jrqj: Go down to @new-londo-ruins, give the @large-magic-ember to @blacksmith-rickert-of-vinheim[Rickert] and upgrade your weapons if needed
steps.mri45zhp: Warp to the Chamber of the Princess bonfire, give the @crystal-ember to the @giant-blacksmith and upgrade your weapons if needed
steps.bozkdhh4: Warp to the @daughter-of-chaos bonfire, go down to the @demon-ruins, rest at the first bonfire

steps.fuqcxc6u: Get the @gold-hemmed-black-set to start the fight

steps.abmaape3: Make sure you are human and continue down in to the ruins
steps.aw5dw2yi: Wait for @knight-kirk to invade and then kill him to get the @spiked-shield and @barbed-straight-sword
steps.nj4yaowk: Roll down to the first platform, kill the @burrowing-rockworm guarding the bonfire and rest there
steps.vxgz9kli: Go down the stairs and go left along the ledge to get the @large-flame-ember from the chest, remembering about the @burrowing-rockworm traps

qxcag375.content: Go back to the fog gate and if you are level two in the @chaos-servant covenant then go down to the right and open the shortcut to @lost-izalith

steps.usjc4g30: If you want to save @solaire-of-astora[Solaire] then kill all the bugs to get the @sunlight-maggot and use this shortcut to talk to him

lxsesvng.content: Go through the fog gate and kill the @demon-firesage

steps.pbpnjo30: Don't forget the @soul-of-a-brave-warrior up the stairs behind the @stone-demon[Stone Demons]

steps.qdimlvd1: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 55-60+ to get summoned
steps.zkhr1qjn: Go upstairs to open the shortcut back to @quelaags-domain
steps.kxx21qqb: Go back the way you came and go down and rest at the bonfire

steps.3mztk2n6: Cut off his tail and then kill the tail to get @orange-charred-ring, though he will drop the ring anyway when killed
steps.emo474k3: Don't forget the @green-titanite-shard in the open area around to the right

steps.xgt96ur6: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 60+ to get summoned
steps.6lmpcoqp: Leave boss area by the tunnel, rest at the bonfire and talk to @solaire-of-astora[Solaire] if he's there

steps.n5ff8s7u: Make your way to the first building, picking up the two souls along the way, and open the chest inside to get another soul
steps.7oh1lk7n: Run up the branch of the next building and get the @twin-humanities
steps.f0c5at28: Drop down to the base of the building and hit the illusory wall of the building, rest at the bonfire and make sure you are human
steps.yosezkgf: Continue on in to the ruins and grab the soul hidden to the left just before you go up the stairs
steps.lcwbpm8o: Go up the stairs, kill the @chaos-eater, kill the Daughter of Chaos to get the @izalith-catalyst, and wait for @knight-kirk to invade and then kill him
steps.n1rxhyeb: Kill the second @chaos-eater and open the chest to get the @chaos-fire-whip pyromancy
steps.6r8cp8r4: Go down the branch and kill all the @stone-demon[Stone Demons]
steps.cgqu935w: Kill the @titanite-demon to get a @demon-titanite and if you didn't open the shortcut earlier then open it now and kill the bugs to get the @sunlight-maggot
steps.hcpjy683: Trigger the collapsing floor by walking to the left of the alcove
steps.2xsibe1a: Put on the @rusted-iron-ring, walk down the branch, do not talk to @siegmeyer-of-catarina[Siegmeyer] yet but instead kill all but one of the @chaos-eater[Chaos Eaters] using ranged attacks
steps.jrihmdzn: Now talk to @siegmeyer-of-catarina[Siegmeyer] and follow him when he jumps in to the pit and make sure he doesn't lose more than half his health while killing the remaining @chaos-eater[Chaos Eaters]
steps.v28i5nou: Grab the soul and @green-titanite-shard[Green Titanite Shards] and then talk to him again
steps.65pej4na: Make your way through the tunnels, getting the @red-titanite-slab from the chest and then the @red-titanite-chunk after going up the stairs
steps.tek2qi27: Make your way back up the branches and back up to the boss fog gate

steps.oqksuxkd: You need to destroy the right orb first, then the left orb and then drop down in the center to kill her

steps.i7lgyx1o: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 60-75+ to get summoned
steps.diyh366m: Warp back to the @daughter-of-chaos bonfire and get the @thorns-set
steps.9a3pc69j: Go back down to the @demon-ruins, kill the @taurus-demon[Taurus Demons], and get the @chaos-flame-ember and soul from the lava
steps.h6ts6wi1: Warp to the Stone Dragon bonfire, walk along the sand to the @ash-lake bonfire and talk to @sieglinde-of-catarina[Sieglinde] to get a @titanite-slab
steps.y6om8ckq: Make sure you are using a @divine-ember[Divine weapon], warp back to @firelink-shrine and continue down in to @the-catacombs

steps.fm776slm: Go down to the first bonfire, kill the @undead-mage and pull the first switch
steps.8cvn6uiw: Use a ranged attack to take out the next @undead-mage
steps.f5a6nopm: Clear out the room the @undead-mage was in and get the @lucerne from the side room
steps.1c0grwks: Continue clearing out this area, grabbing the soul from near the archer, head outside passed the statue spike traps, push the second switch and get the soul
steps.bka4uf6y: Cross the bridge and quickly kill the next @undead-mage
steps.uhu4b55e: Go in to the side room to the right, fall through the floor and try to get the two @crystal-lizard[Crystal Lizards] while avoiding the statue spike traps
steps.x2hdcnc1: Climb up the ladder and fall through the floor again to get back to the second switch
steps.6uf41f4l: Go back across the bridge and at the end of it drop down three times to the left, pick up the @great-scythe and push the third switch
steps.2dlvtnca: Head outside, push the fourth switch, roll through the illusory wall and rest at the bonfire
steps.8lmg4vl6: Go across the bridge and through the fog gate, hit the broken wall, drop down and clear out the room
steps.gwtzphpx: Continue up the steps, watch out for the giant skeleton that drops from the roof and get the @darkmoon-seance-ring from the coffin
steps.hj799c7p: Go out the broken wall, continue up the steps, kill the @undead-mage and climb up the ladder
steps.mic8tkuj: Get the @tranquil-walk-of-peace miracle and fall through the floor to near the start of the level
steps.0ge1b66l: Continue all the way back across the bridges to the building with all of the coffins
steps.jjxfwf5u: Nestle in the coffin on the left just before the @titanite-demon to go to the @tomb-of-giants[Tomb of the Giants] and optionally join the @gravelord-servant covenant
steps.xynjqca6: Use the coffin to get back, go down the corridor and through the broken wall, drop down through the floor and kill the @black-knight to get the @white-titanite-chunk
steps.o74wsnm6: Use ranged attacks to kill all the @wheel-skeleton[Wheel Skeletons] and before dropping down
steps.bj8jcxwl: Go through the tunnel near where you dropped down and kill the @undead-mage to get the @skull-lantern
steps.nw00o13g: Climb up the two ladders and back to entrance of the building with all the coffins, go outside and drop off to the ledge where you can summon @paladin-leeroy
steps.mrk56k3x: Drop off to the next ledge to get the @cleric-set and @mace

steps.gindck26: As described above you can summon @paladin-leeroy from the ledge above the area with the @wheel-skeleton[Wheel Skeletons]
steps.61dmgwr9: You will get the @rite-of-kindling when you kill him
steps.cc63mjrw: He will drop one of @mask-of-the-father, @mask-of-the-mother or @mask-of-the-child

steps.plc4ksjc: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 20-40 or 55-65 to get summoned
steps.334xyq9z: Go up the ladder and continue on the @tomb-of-giants[Tomb of the Giants]

steps.9k33oak6: If you got the @sunlight-maggot then wear it otherwise put the @skull-lantern in your left hand
steps.009ob03p: Slide down the coffins, climb down the ladder and rest at the bonfire
steps.1m75txyt: Go back up the ladder, along the ledge to the right, drop down the hole, kill all the giant skeletons and get the @large-divine-ember
steps.349tp48y: Climb back out, hit the illusory wall along the ledge, climb down the ladder, kill the bone towers and @reah-of-thorolund[Reah's] bodyguards but do not talk to her
steps.ytc2xgmp: Get the @white-titanite-chunk, @skull-lantern, souls and head back up the ladder
steps.bgdut5bc: Talk to @patches-the-hyena, answering No to his question and let him kick you down in to the pit
steps.ao5lsefl: Talk to @reah-of-thorolund[Reah] to get the @replenishment miracle
steps.vjata0q6: Go back up and talk to @patches-the-hyena[Patches] again, answering No to his question to get @twin-humanities
steps.2lzryb1v: Continue passed him and through the fog gate and kill the @the-black-knight[Black Knight] that comes running at you
steps.9s3ntea8: Kill the archer, grab the soul, jump down, get ready for an ambush by bone towers and grab the @covetous-silver-serpent-ring
steps.36tb9wfu: Jump across and kill the giant skeleton and then continue up, hugging the left wall to get the @effigy-shield
steps.o0gof3ok: Go back down to where you killed the last giant skeleton and hug the left wall around to the next bonfire and reverse hollowing
steps.zh1hfto8: Go down the path, grab the @white-titanite-chunk, go down the ladder, wait for @paladin-leeroy to invade and kill him to get @sanctus and @grant
steps.wkm9k22q: Quickly kill the @crystal-lizard in the tunnel
steps.ic0dhp7g: Continue through the tunnel and down the ledge, clear out the Pinwheels and grab the soul and @white-titanite-slab

steps.ffd84npg: After the fight pick up the @paladin-set, though you may need to reload your game to get it to appear

steps.suoyjfjv: Rest at the bonfire, warp to @firelink-shrine

steps.7zgdckcj: Drop down the hole, offer the Lord Souls, warp back to the shrine and talk to @anastacia-of-astora to fully kindle the shrine bonfire

v02uzphc.content: Talk to @patches-the-hyena[Patches], learn his Prostration gesture and buy anything you need from him

steps.pe4dkrrr: You can also buy other various items and weapons

g9czx2yp.content: Take a flight back to @northern-undead-asylum[Undead Asylum] and trade items with @snuggly

steps.assqttda: You can also get various other titanites and miscellaneous items

steps.blbif0di: Go to @undead-parish and talk to @reah-of-thorolund[Reah], learn her Prayer gesture and buy any miracles you need
steps.ck5hiky5: Go to @blacksmith-andrei[Andre] and give him the @large-divine-ember and upgrade your weapon if needed
steps.mz85rw8s: Go back in to the @the-catacombs, drop off the first bridge on to the second, drop down the ledges, go down the spiral staircase and drop down to @blacksmith-vamos
steps.8lupl846: Give him the @large-flame-ember and @chaos-flame-ember and upgrade your weapon if needed
steps.315c1rij: Return to a bonfire and warp to @anor-londo
steps.pknjx515: Put on the @darkmoon-seance-ring, go down the elevator and turn the platform lever anti-clockwise and rest at the bonfire
steps.kgm7428p: Pick up the @ring-of-the-suns-firstborn and optonally join the @blade-of-the-dark-moon covenant

tzeew6ca.content: If you don't want to join the covenant then go through the fog gate and kill @dark-sun-gwyndolin

steps.nsk4gx6d: Get the @sunlight-blade miracle and @brass-set from the chests after killing her
steps.p8orpwe5: You can now buy the @gwyndolin-moonlight-set from @domhnall-of-zena
steps.ryqhjz4c: @darkmoon-knightess will now attack you if you return to the first @anor-londo bonfire and will drop a @fire-keeper-soul[Firekeeper Soul]

steps.3pyjgod1: Remember to go back return the platform to the up position before leaving here
steps.nj3zrkpy: Optionally go and attack @gwynevere to turn @anor-londo dark and get invaded by members of the @blade-of-the-dark-moon covenant
steps.cqqfm0gx: If you don't have the DLC go down to #new-game-plus

steps.xhkqs1rs: Go down to @darkroot-basin and examine the portal found near where you fought the @golden-crystal-golem

vy396fvj.content: Rest at the bonfire and continue through the fog gate and kill the @sanctuary-guardian

steps.6nx975yc: Cut off the tail to get the @guardian-tail

steps.jqcfq7yc: Continue up the path to @oolacile-sanctuary, rest at the bonfire and talk to @elizabeth, answering Yes to her question
steps.jav9dwjv: Get the @humanity from the corpse, head down to @royal-woods and clear out the Ents and the Stone Guardians from the first section
steps.2k2dwp0g: Get the @guardian-set[Guardian Gauntlets] from the tower on the right side, the @blue-titanite-slab from the chest in the center and the @guardian-set[Guardian Leggings] from the left side
steps.2nux7g1r: Cross the bridge on the left, try not to get squashed by @black-dragon-kalameet[Kalameet], quickly kill the @crystal-lizard and watch out for the Stone Guardian that appears
steps.wbhcylc9: Jump down and across the gap on the left and kill the Ents and the Stone Guardian
steps.zv06jz98: Get the @guardian-set[Guardian Helm] from the ledge, and the @guardian-set[Guardian Armor] and @goughs-great-arrow[Gough's Great Arrows] from near where the Stone Guardian was
steps.pihwmrw4: Get the @elizabeths-mushroom from the hidden alcove
steps.z6ncnafc: Jump back across the gap and clear out the Ents on the left and get the @gold-coin
steps.jdmbpg6q: Kill the two Stone Giants near the tower and quickly kill the @crystal-lizard
steps.h3oaz47c: Get the soul from behind the tower, go down on the elevator and then at the bottom grab the soul from around the corner
steps.oviz9fee: Go across the bridge and talk to @marvelous-chester, answering Yes to his question, and buy anything you need from him and use the elevator to open up the shortcut
steps.omn28awy: Go through the fog gate and kill @artorias-the-abysswalker
steps.qxxfm7si: Reload your game and kill @lords-blade-ciaran who should now have appeared to get the @lords-blade-set, the @dark-silver-tracer and the @gold-tracer
steps.l0otdve5: Leave by the other door and in to @oolacile-township and rest at the bonfire
steps.8kx12qde: Go back in to @royal-woods and head down the path beside the elevator in to the valley and at the botton get the soul on the left
steps.8iwc3dsg: Continue along the valley, down the ladder, quickly kill the @crystal-lizard, piss off @black-dragon-kalameet enough that he attacks you once and return to the bonfire

steps.hzuch10q: Make sure you have either a @skull-lantern, @sunlight-maggot or the @cast-light sorcery
steps.dani0vb3: Continue down the steps and stick to the right, grabbing the souls along the way, go around the back of the building and roll down to the next ledge
steps.ir4xm46a: Use your light source on the illusory wall on the building to the left and get the @silver-pendant from the chest
steps.tsgekpoi: Kill everything in the other building and get the @dark-orb sorcery from the chest and the @carvings[I'm Sorry carving] from the Bloathead Mage on the outside ledge
steps.iimnbcxh: Go back to the main path, cross the wooden bridge, get invaded by @marvelous-chester
steps.uhx1c4nn: Continue crossing the wooden bridge, and get the @carvings[Very Good! carving] from the mimic and take out the Bloathead Mage down below with ranged attacks
steps.g34lj43m: Go halfway down the stairs, walk across to the rooftop, and kill the @crystal-lizard. You may have to reload the game to make the Crystal Lizard appear.
steps.3tsyuvfy: Continue down and across the walkway, very carefully clear out the ground floor of the building and get the @rubbish, @dark-fog sorcery and soul
steps.vf9sjx2f: Go upstairs, use your light source on the illusory wall and get the @red-titanite-chunk from the chest
steps.4wcfhe7y: Head back across the rafters, roll down to the balcony and get the @crest-key from the mimic
steps.f37rud8o: Drop on to the roof from the next room and go up and across the roof to get a @twin-humanities
steps.o9uru9w9: Drop off the roof, go across to open up the elevator shortcut and rest at the bonfire
steps.c9g744es: Go back towards the colosseum, go up the stairs to the right and unlock the door using the @crest-key
steps.bzrw2yfy: Talk to @hawkeye-gough twice, answering Yes to both his questions, so that he grounds @black-dragon-kalameet[Kalameet], and buy the @carvings[Hello and Thank You carvings]

ypp5vmvz.content: Go back in to @royal-woods and down to the valley and kill @black-dragon-kalameet[Kalameet]

steps.w3s1xxds: Cut off his tail to get the @obsidian-greatsword
steps.gvejdku4: When you kill him he will drop the @calamity-ring
steps.adch8a3k: When he's dead pick up the souls, the @titanite-slab from the chest underneath the waterfall and the @goughs-great-arrow[Gough's Great Arrows] from the end of the valley

steps.4550q5lo: Return to the colosseum and go back up to talk to @hawkeye-gough to get @goughs-greatbow
steps.5y1i05p0: Go back down the elevator shortcut, carefully clear out the Bloatheads and then kill the Chained Prisoner to get the Helm and Leggings from the @chain-set
steps.exwyv70v: Call the elevator, kill the Bloathead that arrives with it and rest at the bonfire

steps.9iciii64: Make sure you have your light source equipped, go down the path, quickly kill the @crystal-lizard, kill all the Bloatheads and get the @dark-bead sorcery
steps.aooip4ne: Continue down, walk on to the illusory floor on the left, follow the apparition and use the elevator to open a shortcut back to @royal-woods
steps.1yljivu3: Go back down, hit the illusory wall, save @great-grey-wolf-sif[Puppy Sif] from the Humanity Spirits and pick up the @cleansing-greatshield
steps.az08z7d7: Go back out and down to the left, kill all the Humanity Spirits and get the @black-flame pyromancy
steps.ej1i3cgx: Head back up, kill the Bloathead Mage and get the @twin-humanities
steps.17ilqglk: Kill the big group of Humanity Spirits and drop down to get the @carvings[Help Me! carving]
steps.kr77vrno: Drop down again, walk back up, go down the stone pillar, get the @white-titanite-slab and put on the @silver-pendant

steps.xiitr8ed: You can summon @great-grey-wolf-sif[Sif], if you saved him, using the summon sign inside the boss area

steps.syslmin3: Rest at the bonfire, warp to @oolacile-sanctuary and talk to @elizabeth to get three @elizabeths-mushroom[Elizabeth's Mushrooms]

steps.6mvu4wf3: Farm some @humanity if needed and kindle all the @bonfire[Bonfires]
steps.2fa8cehf: If you missed any @ore[Titanites] or @crystal-lizard[Crystal Lizards] go and get them
steps.gio69bcp: Visit the vendors and buy any items, miracles, sorceries and pyromancies that you will need
steps.frkzt045: Get any items you need from @snuggly
steps.sysgio1i: Buy any consumables you need from the various vendors, like arrows
steps.isb11px4: Buy any armor sets you need from @domhnall-of-zena
steps.kf0pres5: Kill @the-ancient-spider-queen and @darkmoon-knightess to get their @fire-keeper-soul[Firekeeper Soul] and talk to @anastacia-of-astora[Anastacia] to reinforce your @estus-flask
steps.c43v4rwq: Kill all the @merchants[Blacksmiths] to get their items
steps.ntoks6gp: Kill all the other @merchants to get their drops

steps.3ppnapno: Drop down the hole and if you haven't already then offer the Lord Souls
steps.9k1vl0a1: Optionally do some @guide-to-co-operative-play[jolly co-op] to get some humanity and souls. You should be level 65-80+ to get summoned

steps.rd1ociq7: After killing him you can use the bonfire to get the good ending and the To Link The Fire achievement
steps.fad5234r: Or you can leave the area to get the evil ending and the Dark Lord achievement

steps.daozy2cp: Congratz on completing one of the best RPGs ever made. Now go #undead-asylum[do it again]!

large-soul-of-a-lost-undead.defaultName: Large Soul of a Lost Undead
